no big deal , says leonard . europe always crisis it always debating its future identity , it just day office . one lessons learned this rejection , however , eu require more debate more democracy future . example , any future expansion eu there referendum . if turkey or balkan states want join , they not only meet all legal human rights requirements , they also accepted voters member countries . they famously say , there deepening before there widening . optimist booster eu , leonard dismissive numerous long-term problems lie ahead . europe overgenerous welfare system become even more burdensome its population ages declines . we seen recently , many european cities large pockets unassimilated immigrants whose numbers increasing rapidly . moreover , high taxation high regulation stifle business formation expansion . he glosses over these issues , leonard exudes confidence european model law negotiaton find way solve these problems . this excellent book familiarize oneself european worldview , it worldview sharply different those who still live hobbsian world power politics

now loser nobody liked best-looking girl around his side .... but it not great it seems ! artificial intelligence , she lacks several common sense traits people . because this she always unintentionally screws things up or hurts people . but her creator stands her all way , trying make her into ideal girl he always dreamed . if he didn't enough issues his hands already .... review ( story ): wow . i never would guessed ken akamatsu would story out this good prior his magnum opus love hina ! this easily one best manga titles out there , it unfortunate it not among more popular works akamatsu created over years . if you're fan manga , you want little bit everything , ai love you you . highly recommended !
